file_content.text: The healers inside were insane! They attacked me. I had to kill them all.
The Mystic said it would be so.
You let me walk into a trap!
Why didn't you warn me?
I just slaughtered a bunch of healers and you don't even bat an eye?
You seem pretty calm.
I won't waste my breath arguing with a bunch of mindless drones.
I'm done talking to you.
We heed the words of the Mystics.
Outsider. The Mystic Valen-Da told us you would come. You may enter the inner sanctum of the shrine.
Was Lord Fulminiss with him?
I'm guessing he wasn't alone.
An outsider accompanied him.
Did he say anything else about me?
He knew I was coming?
Only that you may enter.
I knew all that time I wasted on the pilgrimage would cost me!
So he's already here.
The pilgrimage prepared you to enter the shrine.
I'm going in.
Step aside.
The Mystic hasn't left yet, has he?
Is Valen-Da still here?
I did not see him leave.
Your Mystic brought a Sith into the Shrine of Healing. Doesn't that seem wrong to you?
He's a traitor, you know.
All the Mystics do is right.
Enter.
